# Draft:Arab Social Media Pioneers Award

The Arab Social Media Pioneers Award is an annual award that recognizes and honors outstanding Arab influencers on social media across the Arab world. The award ceremony takes place every December in Dubai, at the Dubai World Trade Centre, under the patronage of His Highness Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, the Ruler of Dubai and Vice President of the United Arab Emirates. The event is organized by the Dubai Press Club.
About the Award
The award was announced in 2015, and the first summit was held in March 2015 at the Dubai World Trade Centre. Dozens of Arab talents from various fields were honored for making a real impact on Arab society, carrying a meaningful message that adds value to their audience. In 2016, the second edition was held, and the third edition took place on December 10, 2018. Nomination applications are received via the official website of the award, with a deadline at the end of November, and the winners are announced during the ceremony held in December.

The Award
The winner receives a shield bearing the logo of the award, with the winner's name engraved on it, along with a certificate of recognition signed by Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum.
